Literature.Title: Cadasides, Calcium-Dependent Acidic Lipopeptides from the Soil Metagenome That Are Active against Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Wu C, Shang Z, Lemetre C, Ternei MA, Brady SF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus RN4220(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 100(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 100(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 100(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 108(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51559(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51559(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A(MIC=2µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(MIC=1µg/ml),Streptococcus oralis ATCC 9811(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli BAS 849(MIC=32-64µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=>64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=>64µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 29906(MIC=>64µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 76485(MIC=>64µg/ml),Schizosaccharomyces pombe(MIC=>64µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae W303(MIC=>64µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(no activity data),Human colon adenocarcinoma HT29(no activity data),Human lung carcinoma H1299(no activity data)
